trans-unit.source: Before you shuffle your deck to start the game, you may reveal this card from your deck and exile an instant or sorcery card you drafted that isn't in your deck.
trans-unit.target: 于你将你的套牌洗牌准备开始游戏前，你可以从你的套牌中展示此牌，并放逐一张你已抽选但不在你套牌中的瞬间或法术牌。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·27 | Arcane Savant | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Arcane Savant enters the battlefield, copy a card you exiled with cards named Arcane Savant. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 当玄秘学者进战场时，复制一张你以名称为玄秘学者之牌放逐的牌。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Canal Courier

trans-unit.target: 每当运河讯使与另一个生物攻击不同的牌手时，运河讯使本次战斗不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: The most effective roadways in Paliano aren't roads at all.
trans-unit.target: 帕兰诺最便捷的道路根本不是条路。

trans-unit.source: Coveted Peacock

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: CN2·29 | Coveted Peacock | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Coveted Peacock attacks, you may goad target creature defending player controls. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 每当簇捧孔雀攻击时，你可以煽惑目标由防御牌手操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.source: Expropriate
trans-unit.target: 征用

trans-unit.source: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for time or money. For each time vote, take an extra turn after this one. For each money vote, choose a permanent owned by the voter and gain control of it. Exile Expropriate.
trans-unit.target: 议争～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「时间」或「金钱」。于本回合后进行额外的若干回合，其数量等同于投票选择「时间」的总票数。对投票选择「金钱」的各牌手而言，该牌手每如此投票一次，便选择一个由他拥有的永久物；你获得这些永久物的操控权。放逐征用。

trans-unit.source: Few things are more valuable than time or money—and Leovold has plenty of both.
trans-unit.target: 鲜有比时间或金钱更为宝贵的东西～而列沃德两者都非常充裕。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·31 | Illusion of Choice | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 待议假象

trans-unit.source: Draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: CN2·31 | Illusion of Choice | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Please vote with a clear head and vigilant heart, knowing each voice is meaningful regardless of the outcome."\n—Ottavio d'Oro, Electoral Committee Speaker of Paliano
trans-unit.target: 「诸位在投票时，请务必保持心神警醒；无论最后结果如何，诸位投下的都是自己的心声。」 ～欧塔维奥德罗， 帕兰诺选举委员会主委

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·220 | Rogue's Passage | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: {4}，{T}：目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.
trans-unit.target: 这谣言很快在小偷之间传开：有座无墙的迷宫，藏有价值无可计量的宝藏。

trans-unit.target: 闪烁石室

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·221 | Shimmering Grotto | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

trans-unit.source: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.
trans-unit.target: 数不清的财富等待着抛弃繁华世界，寻找僻静之处的人。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·222 | Kaya, Ghost Assassin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kaya, Ghost Assassin
trans-unit.target: 驱鬼卡娅

trans-unit.resname: CN2·222 | Kaya, Ghost Assassin | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: 0: Exile Kaya, Ghost Assassin or up to one target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 0：放逐驱鬼卡娅或至多一个目标生物。在你的下一个维持开始时，将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·222 | Kaya, Ghost Assassin | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −1: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: −1：每位对手各失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CN2·222 | Kaya, Ghost Assassin | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −2: Each opponent discards a card and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: −2：每位对手各弃一张牌且你抓一张牌。
